name: Newton and the Apple
description:
So this game is helping Newton to discover gravity.  As I'm still fairly new to Itch.io, I have decided to upload a zip file which contains the index.html, as well as the Build and Template folders.

Let me know if this works.  I hope you folks enjoy!

Use arrow keys to move Newton around, rack up as many points as you can by letting the apples fall on him.  Note: no timer and no lives, so endless...
